movies.title: Cats
movies.author: Mason
movies.text: Nightmare fuel with fur.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.author: Mia
movies.text: Joker stole the show, and my sanity.

movies.title: Battlefield Earth
movies.author: Ryan
movies.text: My brain still hurts.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.author: Grace
movies.text: Cried in space. Zero gravity tears.

movies.title: Twilight
movies.author: Isabella
movies.text: Sparkles don’t save bad acting.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.author: Max
movies.text: Life finds a way to eat you.

movies.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
movies.author: Hannah
movies.text: Explosions over plot. Again.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.author: Finn
movies.text: Circle of life still gets me.

movies.title: The Emoji Movie
movies.author: Owen
movies.text: Should’ve stayed in my phone.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.author: Liam
movies.text: Made me want to start an olive oil business.

movies.title: Dragonball Evolution
movies.author: Chloe
movies.text: Anime fans deserved better. Much better.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.author: Ethan
movies.text: Made me crave a $5 milkshake.

movies.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
movies.author: James
movies.text: Romance? More like cringe marathon.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.author: Ella
movies.text: Took the red pill, now I’m unemployed.

movies.title: Movie 43
movies.author: Henry
movies.text: An assault on comedy itself.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.author: Leo
movies.text: Hope is dangerous. So is this rating.

movies.title: Morbius
movies.author: Ella
movies.text: Not even ironically good.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.author: Nina
movies.text: Are you not entertained? Yes.

movies.title: The Last Airbender
movies.author: Amelia
movies.text: A crime against bending.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.author: Ava
movies.text: Life’s like a box of rewatches.

movies.title: The Room
movies.author: Jack
movies.text: So bad it’s… still bad.

movies.title: Inception
movies.author: Noah
movies.text: Still not sure if I woke up.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.author: Ben
movies.text: Jazz and heartbreak. Great combo.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.author: Lily
movies.text: An onion of a movie. Layers, people.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.author: Isla
movies.text: Two hours of car chases. Bliss.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.author: Ruby
movies.text: Superheroes and shawarma. Perfect.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.author: Sophie
movies.text: Great love story, but the door was big enough.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.author: Oscar
movies.text: Broke the first rule by reviewing it.

movies.title: Frozen
movies.author: Lucas
movies.text: Let it go? Still stuck in my head.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.author: Zoe
movies.text: Blue people, big trees, bigger budget.
